title: Hi! I love walking on our beautiful Riverwalk. I have noticed an oily, gasous looking film on the water at times.I believe that we get our drinking water from the Cape Fear River. My question is this: How do they filter out those noxious chemicals from the water we drink? Regards, WKM.
